Package tasks.coref.spl

Class SPLToXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.spl.SPLToXMLWriter
  • public class SPLToXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to read SPL standoff annotation files and write them as XML that can be understood by XMLReader class.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      Processes a single SPL drug coreference document from the associated files and returns its XML representation.

    • Method Detail

      • processSingleFile

        public static nu.xom.Element processSingleFile​(java.lang.String id,
                                               java.lang.String txtFilename,
                                               java.lang.String annFilename)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Processes a single SPL drug coreference document from the associated files and returns its XML representation.
        Parameters:
        id - the id for the document
        txtFilename - the text file of the document
        annFilename - the annotation file
        Returns:
        the XML representation of the document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with file reading/writing

      • processDirectory

        public static void processDirectory​(java.lang.String in,
                                    java.lang.String out)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Processes a directory of SPL annotation files and writes the corresponding text and SPL XML files to the output directory. The output directory should be a valid directory. SPL annotation directory is expected to have txt, a1, and a2 files.
        Parameters:
        in - the input directory
        out - the output directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with file reading/writing

      • init

        public static void init​(java.util.Properties props)
                 throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Initializes CoreNLP and the sentence segmenter from properties.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to use for initialization
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the sentence segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be accessed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be initializaed
